atomic_tests.name: Stage data from Discovery.bat
atomic_tests.description:
Utilize powershell to download discovery.bat and save to a local file. This emulates an attacker downloading data collection tools onto the host. Upon execution,
verify that the file is saved in the temp directory.

input_arguments.description: Location to save downloaded discovery.bat file

atomic_tests.name: Stage data from Discovery.sh
atomic_tests.description: Utilize curl to download discovery.sh and execute a basic information gathering shell script

input_arguments.description: Location to save downloaded discovery.bat file

dependencies.description: Check if curl is installed on the machine.
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -x "$(command -v curl)" ]; then echo "curl is installed"; else echo "curl is NOT installed"; exit 1; fi
dependencies.get_prereq_command: which apt && apt update && apt install -y curl || which pkg && pkg update && pkg install -y curl

atomic_tests.name: Zip a Folder with PowerShell for Staging in Temp
atomic_tests.description:
Use living off the land tools to zip a file and stage it in the Windows temporary folder for later exfiltration. Upon execution, Verify that a zipped folder named Folder_to_zip.zip
was placed in the temp directory.

input_arguments.description: Location to save zipped file or folder
Location of file or folder to zip
